name: FamilyHub
signal_source: Parent forums: 'I have 6 different apps just to manage my family's schedule and I'm still missing things'
description: Unified family logistics platform that consolidates scheduling, tasks, communications, and coordination into one intuitive interface
target_user: Busy families with children aged 5-18 struggling with coordination across multiple platforms and activities
pain_point_evidence: Parents reporting decision fatigue from managing separate apps for calendar, chores, allowances, school communications, and activity schedules
differentiation: Single app replacement for 5-8 family management tools with smart coordination features
subscription_fit: Family plan pricing with value scaling by household size and complexity
